data.title: 2024 BMES Annual Meeting
data.text:
BMES 2024 Conference Theme

Synergizing Research and Cultural Excellence

2024 BMES Annual Meeting Co-Chairs:

A Message from the 2024 Annual Meeting Co-Chairs

Special Guest Speaker for Opening Plenary

You won't want to miss this talk!

We are delighted to announce that the Opening Plenary Session will feature Gordana Vunjak-Novakovic, the 2017 BMES Robert A. Pritzker Distinguished Lectureship Award Recipient, who will be presenting a special lecture at BMES 2024 in Baltimore, MD.

Presentation Title:

Translational studies of engineered human tissues

Session Date and Time:

Wednesday, October 23

5:00 - 6:00 p.m.

Gordana Vunjak-Novakovic

University Professor

The Mikati Foundation Professor of Biomedical Engineering and Medicine

Professor of Dental Medicine

Director, Laboratory for Stem Cells and Tissue Engineering

Columbia University

FUTURE BMES ANNUAL MEETINGS

October 8-11, 2025 | San Diego, California

October 21-24, 2026 | Orlando, Florida

October 7-10, 2027 | Columbus, Ohio
